measured_by: medial frontal negativity (MFN) amplitude / ERP 290–470 ms window
justification: "…unfair offers evoked MFN, which was found correlated with the sense of participants' justice sensitivity."

measured_by: acceptance rate (Y/N keyboard responses) during Ultimatum Game trials
justification: "For behaviour, we analysed the acceptance rate whereas for EEG, we analysed the MFN."
construct: fairness decision-making / acceptance of offers in the Ultimatum Game

measured_by: Likert-type financial-support rating scale for each charity
justification: "Participants were shown seven fictional charities and asked their financial support on a Likert-type scale."
construct: emotional involvement with charities / charity preference
